---
title: "Publications"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
library(httr2)
req <-
  request("https://api.zotero.org") |>
  req_url_query(
    v = 3,
    include = "bib",
    sort = "date",
    style = "oecologia",
    itemType = "-attachment || note"
  ) |>
  req_headers(`Zotero-API-Key` = Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_API_KEY")) |>
  req_url_path("users", "6720834", "publications", "items") |> 
  req_retry()

resp <- 
  req |> 
  req_perform()

resp %>% 
  resp_body_json() %>% 
  purrr::map("bib") %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  cat()
```
